name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
description: The most amazing peanut butter banana smoothie with only 3 ingredients! Totally vegan and so easy to make. Tastes like a milkshake!
recipeIngredient: 2  bananas, cut into chunks and frozen
1 cup vanilla soy milk, more if needed to blend

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a high powered blender. If you want a chocolate peanut butter smoothie, add in the cocoa powder.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all ingredients in a high powered blender. If you want a chocolate peanut butter smoothie, add in the cocoa powder.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend on high until very smooth, adding more milk as needed. Don't add too much because you want the smoothie to be very thick and milkshake like.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend on high until very smooth, adding more milk as needed. Don't add too much because you want the smoothie to be very thick and milkshake like.

keywords: banana smoothie, peanut butter banana smoothie
